name: School Of Defense
description:
This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021 with the theme: "Joined Together".

Big Billy and his army are threatening the ocean! We must stop him! Use your cannons to keep the army at bay. But you will have to upgrade your defenses, using your mass. Your mass is your health and your currency, upgrade your cannons at the risk of making yourself more vulnerable. Can you save the ocean before it is too late?

Installation Instructions:

1. Download The Zip File

2. Select Your Operating System And Bitrate

3. Launch The Exe
